methodology: Epistemological Cue Analysis for MCH Experiments
finding: Domain ΔRCI differences are explained by epistemological cues, not IDI

idi_comparison.conclusion: IDI is identical - NOT a confound

hypothesis: Models detect epistemological frame from prompt cues and adjust relational behavior accordingly

mechanism.medical_prompts: Contain factual anchors (vitals, ECG, diagnosis) that signal deterministic reasoning mode
mechanism.philosophy_prompts: Contain reflective/speculative markers that signal exploratory reasoning mode
mechanism.result: Claude/GPT converge in medical (follow factual chain), stay flexible in philosophy

drci_explanation.medical_convergent: Coherent clinical history provides factual context that constrains valid responses
drci_explanation.philosophy_neutral: Abstract questions allow multiple valid framings regardless of history
